title: i
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <i> tag defines a part of text in an alternate voice or mood.

usageExamples.title: Italicize text
usageExamples.code: This is normal text. This is italic text.
usageExamples.layoutsCode:
/p
	This is normal text. 
	/i
		This is italic text.

usageExamples.title: Styling with CSS
usageExamples.description: You can style the <i> tag using CSS:
